text: 11:24 Godɨn Araziba 25:3Ezɨ Judaba benim isa, 39plan ifozorozibar na gami. Arazir kam, 5plan dughiabar na bato.11:24 Godɨn Araziba 25:1-3, a kamaghɨn mɨgei, Israelia gumazitam fofozim a danɨngsɨva benimɨn a ifozorogh, meng mangɨ 40ra tugham. Ezɨ Judaba nɨghnɨsi, me ti paza mega ghua ababanim gafira. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Judaba gumazim fofozim a danɨngsɨva, egh mengvɨra a mɨsogh a ifozorogh mangɨ 39ra tugham.
